alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued April 07 at 3:06AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...VERY HIGH TO EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER TODAY... .DISCUSSION...Very windy conditions persist today under variably cloudy skies. A few lingering rain and snow showers can be expected, especially toward south central South Dakota. High temperatures will be in the 40s. North to northwest winds of 25 to 45 mph can be expected, with some gusts of 50 to 70 mph in many areas. Relative humidities will drop to 25 to 40 percent, lowest values generally across far southwest South Dakota. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Friday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the moderate category to high category.
